item.title: DataShare + Docker Compose
item.author: personal.jnapolitano@gmail.com (Justin Napolitano)
item.description: Deploying DataShare with Docker Compose Docker Compose is a powerful tool for defining and running multi-container Docker applications. In this blog post, we will walk through a Docker Compose script that sets up a comprehensive data sharing application stack, including DataShare, Elasticsearch, Redis, and PostgreSQL. This setup ensures seamless data management and sharing across different services. Overview of Services The Docker Compose file defines the following services: DataShare: A powerful data sharing platform.
